privacyPolicy.title: Introduction
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart (“FirgoMart”, “we”, “our”, or “us”) values the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting personal data shared with us. This Privacy Policy explains the manner in which information is collected, used, stored, processed, disclosed, and protected when you access or use the FirgoMart website, mobile application, or related services (collectively, the “Platform”).

By accessing or using the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: 1. Definitions
privacyPolicy.content:
For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:
• “Personal Information” means information that identifies a natural person
• “Sensitive Personal Data or Information (SPDI)” shall have the meaning assigned under the Information Technology (SPDI) Rules, 2011
• “User” “You” or “Your” refers to any person accessing or using the Platform
• “Platform” refers to the FirgoMart website, mobile application, and related services

privacyPolicy.title: 2. Scope and Applicability
privacyPolicy.content:
This Privacy Policy applies to:
• Visitors, registered users, customers, and sellers
• Information collected online through the Platform
• Information collected during transactions, communications, or customer support

This Policy does not apply to third-party websites or services linked from the Platform.

privacyPolicy.title: 3. Information We Collect
privacyPolicy.content:
3.1 Information Provided Directly by You
• Full name
• Mobile number
• Email address
• Shipping and billing addresses
• Account credentials
• Order details, invoices, and customer communications

3.2 Sensitive Personal Data or Information (SPDI)
• Payment-related information required to process transactions
FirgoMart does not store debit card, credit card, CVV, or banking credentials. Payments are processed through RBI-authorized third-party payment gateways.

3.3 Automatically Collected Information
• IP address and device identifiers
• Browser, OS, and device type
• Usage patterns, clickstream data, and logs
• Cookies, pixels, and similar tracking technologies

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Lawful Basis for Processing
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart processes personal data based on:
• User consent
• Performance of a contract (order fulfillment)
• Compliance with legal obligations
• Legitimate business interests

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Purpose of Data Processing
privacyPolicy.content:
Information is collected and used for:
• User registration and authentication
• Order processing, payment handling, and delivery
• Customer support and grievance redressal
• Platform analytics and service improvement
• Fraud detection and security monitoring
• Legal, regulatory, and audit compliance

privacyPolicy.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart uses cookies and similar technologies to:
• Enable essential platform functionality
• Store user preferences
• Analyze traffic and usage behavior

Users may control cookies via browser or device settings; however, disabling cookies may affect certain features.

privacyPolicy.title: 7. Data Sharing and Disclosure
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart does not sell or rent personal data.

Information may be shared only with:
• Logistics and delivery partners
• Payment gateway service providers
• Sellers (marketplace model)
• IT and service providers acting on our behalf
• Government or statutory authorities as required by law

All third parties are bound by confidentiality and data protection obligations.

privacyPolicy.title: 8. Cross-Border Data Transfer
privacyPolicy.content: Personal data may be stored or processed on servers located within or outside India. FirgoMart ensures that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and reasonable security safeguards.

privacyPolicy.title: 9. Data Security Measures
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart implements reasonable security practices, including:
• Secure servers and encrypted data transmission
• Access control and authentication mechanisms
• Regular system monitoring

Despite best efforts, absolute security cannot be guaranteed.

privacyPolicy.title: 10. Data Retention Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to:
• Fulfill stated purposes
• Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
• Resolve disputes and enforce agreements

privacyPolicy.title: 11. User Rights and Choices
privacyPolicy.content:
Users may:
• Access and review personal data
• Request correction or updates
• Request account deletion (subject to legal obligations)
• Withdraw consent where applicable

Requests may be submitted via the contact details below.

privacyPolicy.title: 12. User Obligations
privacyPolicy.content:
Users agree to:
• Provide accurate and complete information
• Maintain confidentiality of login credentials
• Use the Platform in compliance with applicable laws

FirgoMart is not responsible for inaccuracies provided by users.

privacyPolicy.title: 13. Third-Party Links and Services
privacyPolicy.content: The Platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. FirgoMart is not responsible for their privacy practices or content.

privacyPolicy.title: 14. Children’s Data
privacyPolicy.content: The Platform is not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. FirgoMart does not knowingly collect personal data of minors.

privacyPolicy.title: 15. Limitation of Liability
privacyPolicy.content:
FirgoMart shall not be liable for:
• Unauthorized access beyond reasonable control
• Acts or omissions of third-party service providers
• User negligence or misuse of the Platform

privacyPolicy.title: 16. Indemnification
privacyPolicy.content: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless FirgoMart from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from misuse of the Platform or violation of this Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: 17. Force Majeure
privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart shall not be liable for failure or delay in performance due to events beyond reasonable control, including natural disasters, technical failures, or governmental actions.

privacyPolicy.title: 18. Severability
privacyPolicy.content: If any provision of this Privacy Policy is held invalid, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

privacyPolicy.title: 19. Waiver
privacyPolicy.content: Failure by FirgoMart to enforce any provision shall not constitute a waiver of such provision.

privacyPolicy.title: 20. Communication Address & Grievance Redressal
privacyPolicy.content:
In accordance with the Information Technology Act, 2000 and applicable rules:

Majherpara, P.O. Hatiara, P.S. Newtown,

privacyPolicy.content: FirgoMart reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Updated versions will be effective upon publication on the Platform.

privacyPolicy.content: This Privacy Policy shall be governed by the laws of India. All disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts in India.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy – FirgoMart
cookiesPolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how FirgoMart ("FirgoMart", "we", "our", or "us") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on the FirgoMart website and mobile application (collectively, the "Platform"). This Policy should be read together with our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions. By continuing to use the Platform, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Cookie Policy.

cookiesPolicy.title: 1. What Are Cookies
cookiesPolicy.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, mobile phone, or tablet) when you visit a website or use an application. Cookies help the Platform recognize your device, remember preferences, and improve user experience.

subSections.title: 2.1 Essential Cookies
subSections.content: These cookies are mandatory for the Platform to function properly. They enable:
points: User login and authentication
Cart and checkout functionality
Security and fraud prevention
Without these cookies, the Platform may not function correctly

subSections.title: 2.2 Performance & Analytics Cookies
subSections.content: These cookies help us understand how users interact with the Platform by collecting information such as:
points: Pages visited
Time spent on pages
Error reports and performance data
Data is aggregated and anonymized and used to improve Platform performance

subSections.title: 2.3 Functional Cookies
subSections.content: These cookies allow the Platform to remember:
points: Language preferences
Location settings
Saved login details (where applicable)
They enhance user convenience and personalization

subSections.title: 2.4 Advertising & Marketing Cookies
subSections.content: These cookies may be used to:
points: Display relevant advertisements
Measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns
Prevent repetitive ads
Third-party advertising partners may place their own cookies subject to their privacy policies

cookiesPolicy.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
cookiesPolicy.content: Some cookies may be placed by third-party service providers, including analytics providers, advertising networks, and payment or security service providers. FirgoMart does not control third-party cookies, and their use is governed by the respective third-party privacy policies.

cookiesPolicy.title: 4. How We Use Cookie Data
points: Ensure secure and smooth Platform operation
Improve website and app functionality
Analyze user behavior and trends
Personalize content and advertisements
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements

cookiesPolicy.title: 5. Managing Cookies
points: Through browser settings
Through mobile device settings
Via cookie preference tools available on the Platform (if enabled)
Disabling cookies may affect certain features and functionalities of the Platform

cookiesPolicy.title: 6. Mobile Application Tracking
cookiesPolicy.content: In mobile applications, FirgoMart may use Software Development Kits (SDKs), device identifiers, and app analytics tools. These technologies function similarly to cookies and help improve app performance and user experience.

cookiesPolicy.title: 7. Data Protection and Security
cookiesPolicy.content: All information collected through cookies is handled in accordance with FirgoMart’s Privacy Policy. FirgoMart implements reasonable security measures to protect cookie-related data.

cookiesPolicy.title: 8. Changes to This Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.content: FirgoMart reserves the right to update or modify this Cookie Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective upon posting on the Platform.

cookiesPolicy.title: 9. Contact Information
cookiesPolicy.content: If you have any questions regarding this Cookie Policy, you may contact us at: Company Name: FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited, Email: support@firgomart.com.

cookiesPolicy.title: 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
cookiesPolicy.content: This Cookie Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts in India.
